Row.Text: This is the currently selected Unit.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Click to center the camera on it)

{TXT_KEY_GRAMMAR_UPPER_A_AN << {@1_UnitName}} has been born in {1_CityName:textkey}![NEWLINE]You may expend him to gain 2 Civilization Points, or you may make him into a Unit,[NEWLINE]which will allow you to use his special power in a City!
You may provide {1_CivName:textkey} a gift of Gold.
With at least {1_NumGold} Gold, you may provide {2_CivName:textkey} with a gift.
It's not worth the Gold. Leave them.
The Barbarians have captured one of your civilian Units! They are requesting {1_Num} Gold in exchange for the lives of your subjects. What is your response?
Your empire contains {1_Num} City(s)! For this accomplishment, you have gained {2_Num} Civilization Point!
Your Team contains {1_Num} City(s)! For this accomplishment, you have gained {2_Num} Civilization Point!
You own a City with a Population of {1_Num}! For this accomplishment, you have gained {2_Num} Civilization Point!
Your Team owns a City with a Population of {1_Num}! For this accomplishment, you have gained {2_Num} Civilization Point!
The game is currently processing other players' turns.
You may adopt a new Social Policy!
You may select a new research project for your empire!
You may select a free technology for your empire!
You may select a free great person for your empire!
You may select a new construction project for one of your Cities!
Tell the currently selected Unit to do nothing this turn.
Select a unit that is stacked with another unit of the same type.
Select a unit that needs orders before the turn can end.
Select a unit that is awaiting promotion. All units must be promoted before you may end the turn.
Perform a ranged attack against a nearby enemy.
You must vote in the United Nations!
The game is waiting for other players to finish their turn.
End your turn, allowing the other players in the game to act.
An enemy unit has been spotted in our territory!
Because the empire has at least 20 [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness, an uprising has occurred in our territory!
You are at war with a human player. Your turns will be played sequentially with all warring civilizations until the conflict is over.
Your war with a human player has ended. Your turns will be played simultaneously with all non-warring civilizations.
A civilian was captured by Barbarians!
{TXT_KEY_GRAMMAR_UPPER_A_AN << {@1_UnitName}} was captured by the Barbarians! They will take it to their nearest Encampment. If you wish to recover your unit you will have to track it down!
You Have Researched A New Technology!
Please select a new Technology to research and develop for your Civilization.
A great person has discovered a new technology for your civilization.
Hides additional actions your Unit may perform.
Reveals additional actions your Unit may perform.
Allows embarked units to cross oceans
Allows embarked units to defend themselves
You have made a proposal to {1_Player}
Your offer to {1_Player} is no longer valid.
Your offer from {1_Player} is no longer valid.
You have accepted the offer from {1_Player}
Your offer to {1_Player} has been accepted
You have rejected the offer from {1_Player}
Your offer to {1_Player} has been rejected
You have withdrawn your offer to {1_Player}
The offer from {1_Player} has been withdrawn
You have made a counter-offer to {1_Player}
Your empire can support {1_Num} Units. You are over that limit by {2_Num}, which decreases [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in your Cities by {3_Num}%.

Would you like to adopt {1_NewBranchName:textkey}? Doing so will abandon {2_OldBranches}, and all benefits provided. It will also cause your empire to enter [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Anarchy[ENDCOLOR] for 1 turn, during which it will not collect [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production, [ICON_RESEARCH] Science or [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
{1_PlayerName:textkey} disconnected. The AI will take control.
Click here to talk to the owner of this city!
You have not yet met this player!
You are always at war with the owner of this city!
[NEWLINE]May not be built while the empire is [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Very Unhappy.
[NEWLINE]Special unit type may not be built.
[NEWLINE]Settlers may only be built in Cities with at least {1_Num} [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens.
[NEWLINE]Settlers may only be built in Cities with at least 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens.
, providing {1_Num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to the nearest City.

[ICON_FOOD] Food is what determines how fast your City grows to acquire new [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens. Citizens work the land and collect [ICON_FOOD], [ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD] for the City. Bigger Cities are nearly always better!
[ICON_PRODUCTION] Production is what determines how fast a City can build Units, Buildings, etc. It is collected from the Terrain, Buildings and more.
[ICON_GOLD] Gold is stockpiled in the national treasury, and may be used to expand your territory, purchase items in Cities and as leverage in Diplomacy.
[ICON_RESEARCH] Science is used to advance your civilization technologically, unlocking new Units, Buildings and more.
[ICON_CULTURE] Culture helps Cities claim new territory, allowing them to be more productive. It is also spent on [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Social Policies[ENDCOLOR] at the empire-level.
Congratulations! Your citizens have been happy with your rule for so long that the empire enters a Golden Age!
Toggles between the Strategic View and Normal Game View.
Quest: connect with road for [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence bonus[NEWLINE]
Congratulations! The discovery of {@1_NWName} has increased [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness in the empire.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Output if worked:
[NEWLINE]For finding this wonder first you have gained {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD]
[NEWLINE]For finding this wonder (after another team) you have gained {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD]
Do you want to assign civilians to different tiles?
Do you want to give {1_CivName} your {2_UnitName}?
You have captured a civilian which used to belong to {1_CivName}. You have the choice of returning it to them, or taking it for yourself as {TXT_KEY_GRAMMAR_A_AN << {@2_NewUnitName}}.
Returning it will earn you {1_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence!
If you return it, they shall be very grateful!
My studies show that your people trust your leadership. Keep exploring and meeting other civilizations, for who knows where the future may lead? We may reach the stars one day!
All civilizations are constantly at war with each other.[NEWLINE]Diplomacy should be the least of your concerns.
We don't have any tradeable cities.
They don't have any tradeable cities.
Ask your advisors about the current situation.
Choose a leader to speak with...
This will permanently delete your save file. Are you sure you want to do this?
This will overwrite your current save file. Are you sure you want to do this?
This will permanently delete this Mod. Are you sure you want to do this?
Are you sure you wish to disable this mod?
This will also disable the following mods:
Are you sure you wish to enable this mod?
This will also enable the following mods:
Are you sure you want to publicly denounce {@1_LeaderName}?
Are you sure you want to declare war?
Are you sure you want to declare war on {1_CivName:textkey}? They are currently under the protection of:
Are you sure you want to adopt this Social Policy?
Are you sure you want to kick {1_PlayerName:textkey} from the game?
[NEWLINE]Cannot purchase while another unit is stationed in this City.
[NEWLINE]You do not have enough [ICON_GOLD] Gold to buy this.
